verses.verse: A Psalm of Solomon. Give <S%H5414><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, And thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>.
He will judge <S%H1777><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> with righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, And thy poor <S%H6041><s%> with justice <S%H4941><s%>.
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall bring <S%H5375><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%>, And the hills <S%H1389><s%>, in righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, He will save <S%H3467><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%>, And will break in pieces <S%H1792><s%> the oppressor <S%H6231><s%>.
They shall fear <S%H3372><s%> thee while <S%H5973><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> endureth <S%H6440><s%>, And so long as the moon <S%H3394><s%>, throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
He will come down <S%H3381><s%> like rain <S%H4306><s%> upon the mown <S%H1488><s%> grass <S%H7241><s%>, As showers that water <S%H2222><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
In his days <S%H3117><s%> shall the righteous <S%H6662><s%> flourish <S%H6524><s%>, And abundance <S%H7230><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>, till the moon be no more <S%H3394><s%>.
He shall have dominion <S%H7287><s%> also from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea <S%H3220><s%>, And from the River <S%H5104><s%> unto the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
They that dwell in the wilderness <S%H6728><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H341><s%>; And his enemies shall lick <S%H3897><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%>.

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> and of the isles <S%H339><s%> shall render <S%H7725><s%> tribute <S%H4503><s%>: The kings <S%H4428><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Seba <S%H5434><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> gifts <S%H814><s%>.
Yea <S%H4428><s%>, all kings shall fall down <S%H7812><s%> before him <S%H1471><s%>; All nations shall serve him <S%H5647><s%>.
For he will deliver <S%H5337><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%> when he crieth <S%H7768><s%>, And the poor <S%H6041><s%>, that hath no helper <S%H5826><s%>.
He will have pity <S%H2347><s%> on the poor <S%H1800><s%> and needy <S%H1800><s%>, And the souls <S%H5315><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%> he will save <S%H3467><s%>.

He will redeem <S%H1350><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from oppression <S%H8496><s%> and violence <S%H2555><s%>; And precious <S%H3365><s%> will their blood <S%H1818><s%> be in his sight <S%H5869><s%>:

And they shall live <S%H2421><s%>; and to him shall be given <S%H5414><s%> of the gold <S%H2091><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%>: And men shall pray <S%H6419><s%> for him continually <S%H8548><s%>; They shall bless <S%H1288><s%> him all the day long <S%H3117><s%>.

There shall be abundance <S%H6451><s%> of grain <S%H1250><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> upon the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>; The fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof shall shake <S%H7493><s%> like Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>: And they of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall flourish <S%H6692><s%> like grass <S%H6212><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

His name <S%H8034><s%> shall endure for ever <S%H5769><s%>; His name <S%H8034><s%> shall be continued <S%H5125><s%> as long as <S%H6440><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%>: And men shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> in him <S%H1471><s%>; All nations shall call him happy <S%H833><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Who only doeth <S%H6213><s%> wondrous things <S%H6381><s%>:

And blessed <S%H1288><s%> be his glorious <S%H3519><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; And let the whole earth <S%H776><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with his glory <S%H3519><s%>. Amen <S%H543><s%>, and Amen <S%H543><s%>.
The prayers <S%H8605><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%> are ended <S%H3615><s%>.
